text: Parigi Coppelletti or Copelleti (Active in 1590s) was an Italian painter. ==Life== Born in Reggio Emilia, he was active mainly in fresco. For the Basilica della Ghiara (whose construction only started 1597), he painted a facade (dell Occa). For the church of Sant'Agostino, Reggio Emilia, he painted a St Nicolo da Tolentino with angelic choir.quoting Gius. Borzani, Antiquarium Regii Lepidi, Mss. del Libreria Reale, à p. 96.Abecedario de P.J. Mariette: et autres notes inédites de cet amateur sur les Arts et les Artistes, Volume 2, by Pierre Jean Mariette, Philippe de Chennevières, Anatole de Montaiglon; Publisher: JB Dumoulin, Quai des Agustins #13, Paris; 1853-1854; page 3. ==References== Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown Category:16th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters
title: Parigi Coppelletti
